name: Applycorner
tag_list: application, apply, studying, learning, personal-statement, recommendation-letter, application-process, applicant, tracking
overview:
Applycorner is an application which assists you during the application process. This includes school selection by recommendation from our experienced community and system, process management as we remind you of when to submit what documents and application suggestions based on the insight of our community.

Applycorner is an application whose aim is to accompany you throughout your application progress.

  1. Why do you need it? Most applicants apply to many schools and applycorner will help coordinate the logistics of all the various material.
  2. What is our web app? Applycorner is designed to help you monitor more efficiently your application progress.
  3. How does our app work? The system guide you step by step of how to complete your applications and remind you about deadlines
